name: PAX Markets, Inc.
long_description: PAX is a new exchange that brings the power of HFT to the people. If you’re an algorithmic trader, you can get “instant” order placement made possible with our "co-lo on a chip" technology. If you don’t care about speed, you pay zero fees and get cash back on your trades. We are launching in crypto first with BTC & ETH spot trading.
one_liner: First "co-lo on a chip" crypto exchange for ultra-fast trading.
